1.paragraph: I enjoy building things, I've been fortunate enough to cover a lot of ground in terms of what and how I influence what gets built; from nanotechnology to ecommerce - as a researcher, product manager and various support roles.

2.paragraph: Currently, I'm transitioning from product to software engineering. It's not a new endeavour, it's been in the back of my mind for over a decade, and I'm finally coming around to recognize that it has been my calling all along.

3.paragraph: As a Software Engineer I will bring with me a deep curiosity to understand customer needs and business challenges that I've been fortunate enough to immerse myself in as a Product Manager over the years.
